title: "Dad" t-shirt
content:
Hey, I'm a new dad!

My wife was looking around for a t-shirt to give me on Father's Day. Something like "#1 Dad" or "World's Greatest Dad" or something. But she knows I won't wear it unless the type looks really good. Haha.

Have you seen any "Dad" t-shirts that look good? (Printed on American Apparel would be a major bonus.)

Thanks!
author: Tim Brown

comments.content:
Here's my favorite T-shirt:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022012906im_/http:/typophile.com/files/imprinter_4591.jpg)
  
(though I have a hunch it's not printed on American apparel).

Congrats on becoming a new Dad.

BTW, why do we congratulate the father. Seems to me that Mom does most of the work

:)
Thanks Don! I have no idea. I'm with you. My wife is amazing.

We congratulate the father because it is his child to have and to love, too:-)  
Tim these will be the happiest years of your life! Enjoy!

ChrisL

Congratulations, Tim. It's a great feeling to be a dad.

Etsy has some cool ones:

[No type, but too good to pass up](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022012906/http:/www.etsy.com/view_listing.php?listing_id=26509780&ref=sr_gallery_1&&ga_search_query=father%27s+day+tshirt&ga_search_type=handmade&ga_page=&order=date_desc&includes%5B%5D=tags&includes%5B%5D=title)

[Script "Dad Since 2009" tee](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022012906/http:/www.etsy.com/view_listing.php?listing_id=26462751&ref=sr_gallery_5&&ga_search_query=father%27s+day+tshirt&ga_search_type=handmade&ga_page=2&order=date_desc&includes%5B%5D=tags&includes%5B%5D=title)

[A little Sailor Jerry style for your shirt](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022012906/http:/www.etsy.com/view_listing.php?listing_id=26306837&ref=sr_gallery_2&&ga_search_query=father%27s+day+tshirt&ga_search_type=handmade&ga_page=5&order=date_desc&includes%5B%5D=tags&includes%5B%5D=title)
